quotes.quote: I used to be afraid of failing at something that really mattered to me, but now I'm more afraid of succeeding at things that don't matter.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of the human freedoms—to choose one’s attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one’s own way.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Football is like life – it requires perseverance, self-denial, hard work, sacrifice, dedication and respect for authority.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: I used to want to fix people, but now I just want to be with them.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Those who have a 'why' to live, can bear with almost any 'how'.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The greatest accomplishment is not in never falling, but in rising again after you fall.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Simply put: love does.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: It's the job that's never started as takes longest to finish.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: In some ways suffering ceases to be suffering at the moment it finds a meaning, such as the meaning of a sacrifice.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Every time we see people as ordinary, we turn the wine back into water.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: A man that flies from his fear may find that he has only taken a short cut to meet it.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: So live as if you were living already for the second time and as if you had acted the first time as wrongly as you are about to act now!
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: Never memorize something that you can look up.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I’ve never known a man worth his salt who, in the long run, deep down in his heart, didn’t appreciate the grind, the discipline.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Love one another. We don’t need more instructions; we need more examples.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: Short cuts make long delays.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Happiness cannot be pursued; it must ensue.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: Any fool can know. The point is to understand.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Don’t succumb to excuses. Go back to the job of making the corrections and forming the habits that will make your goal possible.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
